value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What?! A...sleeping sickness?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|That's right. We've received reports
from Askr's border villages, in the
wheat country.$k$pThe villages in that region are known
for their liveliness, but a patrol in the
area noticed an eerie quiet...$k$pThe villagers had not gone...
Everyone was asleep.$k$pNothing could stir them from their
slumber. Neither calling out to them
nor shaking them by the shoulder.$k$pDay and night, they sleep on.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|But they are...still alive?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|Yes. But they seem to be suffering.
All struggle against unseen phantoms,
as if trapped in endless nightmares.$k$pOur soldiers and healers are doing
all they can, but...their efforts have
so far awoken none.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|I see... Please, Your Majesty, allow
the Order of Heroes to take this on.$k$pWe can resolve the issue in no time!
Let's get ready to go, everyone!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Right! There will be some good news
soon, Mother. We will make sure of it.$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|Alfonse, wait. Take this.
You may need it.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What is it? ...An incense burner?$k$p$WmMPID_ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Normal,Face|That's right—the Redolent Censer.
It is a legendary treasure long held
by Askr.$k$pIf the sleep sickness is caused by
some poison in the air, the censer's
sweet perfume will keep you safe.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Use it to protect yourselves.
And be mindful not to lose it.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Thank you, Mother. We will be
careful—and will return soon.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Oh, hello. Lovely weather, isn't it?
How have you been? Well, I hope.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Loki... I should have guessed.
What have you done this time?!$k$p$WmMPID_ロキ,ch00_08_Loki_F_Normal,Face|Me? I haven't done a thing. If you
want someone to blame...well...
I wouldn't want to spoil the surpise.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|She's gone...again! We'll never get
close enough to capture her!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|What was it Loki said? It seems
she may have some insight into the
cause of the sleeping sickness.$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|It is possible that Loki is, in fact,
behind this. Lying is well within her
powers. We must remain vigilant!$k$p$Sbs150|
